title: Aw hmangaihna sawi thiam ila
lyrics:
Aw, hmangaihna sawi thiam ila,
Nazaret Isua ngei kha;
Chuti takin min hmangaih a,
Mi sual thiam loh chang tawh hnu.

'Aw, hmangaihna a va mak em!'
Tih chu ka hla ni sela;
Aw, hmangaihna a va mak em!
Ka chhandamtu'n min hmangaih.

Ka tan huanah a tawngtai a,
Nangma tan pawh a tawngtai,
A tana lungngai a ni lo,
Ka tan a thisen a far.

Angel-ten amah khawngaihin,
Khawvel enin an lo kal;
A lungngaihna thlamuan turin,
Ka sual tlanna zanah chuan.

Ka sual lungngaihthlak a kalpui,
Ama tana inbelin;
A phur Kalvari-a nghatin,
A tuarin a tlan zo ta.

A ropuinaa inthuamin,
A hmel mawi ka hmuh hunin,
Ka tan a hmangaihna mak chu,
Ka chatuan hla a ni ang.
